Author: flussshed
Text: The line between being healthy and unhealthy can be so blurred, especially when trying to recover... like am I doing this because I’m proactive in my health or am I doing this because I still desire that unattainable idea of being “skinny enough” ?   It’s so complicated for me to understand about myself :/

Author: cupcakelimao
Text: I'm there. I'm not starving, bur obsessively counting calories and being very disciplined. Sometimes I slip and stay under 800, 600 or 500cals, but usually stay around 1000 and 1300. Been running (and enjoying the feeling of running), exercising, lifting weights (and eating more when I lift, sleeping well...  Not sure if healthy or unhealthy
